sentences.sContent: 100,000 federal workers will be laid off to reduce the deficit.
sentences.sCn: 10万名联邦工作人员将被解雇以减少赤字。

remMethod.val: lay(v. 放置) + off(远离) → 把你远远地放在一边 → 解雇

trans.tranOther: If workers are laid off, they are told by their employers to leave their job, usually because there is no more work for them to do
